医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
运动员严格的热量限制会降低运动表现并损害免疫系统在比赛前大幅减少热量摄入以减轻体重对于运动员来说是很常见的事情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Drastic-caloric-restriction-by-athletes-diminishes-performance-and-compromises-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Drastic-caloric-restriction-by-athletes-diminishes-performance-and-compromises-the-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78ce4807-b420-4555-9df1-34927225ce3d Mon, 15 Jul 2024 14:18:45 -0400 Drastic caloric restriction by athletes diminishes performance and compromises the immune system
科罗拉多州家禽工人报告了 5 例禽流感病例，是今年美国病例数的两倍科罗拉多州公共卫生部门 7 月 14 日报告称，科罗拉多州东北部一家家禽养殖场的 5 名工作人员禽流感检测呈阳性。这使得美国已知病例数达到 9 例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/5-cases-of-bird-flu-reported-in-Colorado-poultry-workers-doubling-this-yeare28099s-US-tally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/5-cases-of-bird-flu-reported-in-Colorado-poultry-workers-doubling-this-yeare28099s-US-tally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bef7e400-7d2d-42f6-95d9-5c48ac937cd3 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 14:04:32 -0400 5 cases of bird flu reported in Colorado poultry workers, doubling this year’s US tally
当男性气质受到威胁时，青春期男孩可能会做出攻击性反应人们早就知道，某些男人在看到自己的男子气概受到威胁时会变得具有攻击性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Adolescent-boys-may-respond-aggressively-when-masculinity-is-under-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Adolescent-boys-may-respond-aggressively-when-masculinity-is-under-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e49305-5de5-42ef-b390-f8a4aec9fa07 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 14:02:51 -0400
揭示液-液相分离在神经退行性疾病中的作用研究表明，液-液相分离并不是淀粉样原纤维形成的前兆，淀粉样原纤维是帕金森病的病理标志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Unraveling-the-role-of-liquid-liquid-phase-separation-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Unraveling-the-role-of-liquid-liquid-phase-separation-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecba8d21-dc4f-4388-bc1f-ce4fc27e3952 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 13:53:59 -0400 Unraveling the role of liquid-liquid phase separation in neurodegenerative diseases
精确的大脑成像方法揭示创造力的起源当您正在思考完全不同的事情时，您是否曾经突然想到一个棘手问题的解决方案？创造性思维是人类的一个标志，但它是一种短暂的、几乎是自相矛盾的能力，如果不被发现，就会出人意料地引人注目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Precise-brain-imaging-method-reveals-origins-of-creativity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Precise-brain-imaging-method-reveals-origins-of-creativity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f84d813-6e83-4902-9e43-3a5be4e57e4b Mon, 15 Jul 2024 13:09:26 -0400 Precise brain imaging method reveals origins of creativity
长期 30 年 CVD 风险可能有助于为 1 期高血压的治疗提供信息对用于计算个人患心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险的两种风险预测工具进行的比较表明，除了短期 10 年风险之外，还应考虑长期 30 年风险，以帮助告知何时发生根据今天发表在美国心脏协会杂志《高血压》上的新研究，开始治疗 1 期高血压或高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Long-term-30-year-CVD-risk-may-help-inform-therapy-for-stage-1-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Long-term-30-year-CVD-risk-may-help-inform-therapy-for-stage-1-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50b77f37-0c62-4d79-9ee1-69f1d71902f6 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 13:04:44 -0400 Long-term, 30-year CVD risk may help inform therapy for stage 1 hypertension
前列腺癌筛查后诊断测试的自付费用很常见并且不断上升前列腺特异性抗原 (PSA) 筛查旨在识别可能患有潜在致命性前列腺癌的男性，而 PSA 结果较高的男性通常需要更广泛（且昂贵）的诊断测试才能确诊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Out-of-pocket-costs-from-diagnostic-testing-after-prostate-cancer-screening-are-common-and-rising.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Out-of-pocket-costs-from-diagnostic-testing-after-prostate-cancer-screening-are-common-and-rising.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c69b8f3-2ef8-435a-af32-ba942268dde1 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 12:59:13 -0400 Out-of-pocket costs from diagnostic testing after prostate cancer screening are common and rising
调查：大多数美国人认为女性产后经历疼痛和失禁是正常的奥兰多健康高级康复研究所的一项新的全国调查发现，大多数美国人认为女性在生完孩子后经历疼痛、压力和失禁是正常的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Survey-Most-Americans- believe-its-normal-for-women-to-experience-pain-and-incontinence-post-childbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Survey-Most-Americans- believe-its-normal-for-women-to-experience-pain-and-incontinence-post-childbirth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b33ea39c-821f-480d-9ffa-0d22361244e7 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 12:45:12 -0400 Survey: Most Americans believe it's normal for women to experience pain and incontinence post-childbirth
新研究旨在帮助降低阿片类药物滥用和过量的风险新的研究旨在帮助减少急诊科就诊后未使用的处方阿片类药物的数量，并降低阿片类药物滥用和过量的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-research-aims-to-help-lessen-the-risk-of-opioid-misuse-and-overdose.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-research-aims-to-help-lessen-the-risk-of-opioid-misuse-and-overdose.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dffb8377-2d32-4ff3-a45e-b4f6872354f9 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 12:30:43 -0400 New research aims to help lessen the risk of opioid misuse and overdose
Mogrify 任命 Jonathan Appleby 博士为首席科学官随着公司将多个治疗项目推向临床开发并进入临床开发，战略性招聘增强了执行领导团队的实力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Mogrify-appoints-Dr-Jonathan-Appleby-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Mogrify-appoints-Dr-Jonathan-Appleby-as-Chief-Scientific-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c400c519-eca1-462d-8bc0-e63e6f744142 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 11:34:00 -0400 Mogrify appoints Dr. Jonathan Appleby as Chief Scientific Officer
